title: Katie Price's ex Charles Drury claims she is 'talking to married stars BEHIND Kris Boyson's back'
text:
Katie Price's toyboy ex Charles Drury has boldly claimed that the star is talking to married stars and even arranging to meet up with them behind her on-off fiancé Kris Boyson's back.

The builder, 22, and mother-of-five, 41, met earlier this year when she was reportedly still with Kris, 31, leading to heartache yet things have now ended in a bitter storm.

In his explosive interview, Charles claimed that Katie was talking to married stars when they were still together and he would 'see the messages pop up'.

Claims: Katie Price's toyboy ex Charles Drury has boldly claimed that the star is talking to married stars and even arranging to meet up with them behind her on-off fiancé Kris Boyson's back (pictured recently on her YouTube channel)

Talking to The Sun, he said: 'When she was with me she was definitely talking to people and arranging to meet up with them, I used to see the messages pop up.

'There are a few famous people who are married.'

Charles went on to talk about Kris and claimed that he would never take someone back 'who has cheated on him' but insisted that the personal trainer is 'his own man'.

He added to the publication: 'I wouldn't marry someone who's doing the dirty publicly behind your back. Whether it's all a big stunt or to try and keep relevant, only they will know if it's fake or real.'

Ex-lover: The builder (pictured), 22, and mother-of-five, 41, met earlier this year when she was reportedly still with Kris, 31, leading to heartache yet things have now ended in a bitter storm

On-off beau: Charles went on to talk about Kris (pictured in 2018) and claimed that he would never take someone back 'who has cheated on him' but insisted that the personal trainer is 'his own man'

Charles, who claims some people don't even want to be 'associated' with him anymore and he's out of a job, also said that he refused to be 'Mr Price' as he wasn't happy with their relationship.

He added that Katie has reportedly been in touch since their split and tried to get him back, with the builder claiming he's been 'treated like a mug' and that she's not a 'victim'.

MailOnline has contacted both Katie and Kris' representatives for comment.

Charles' claims comes after he showed his true colours with a separate kiss and tell with the publication in which he claimed they enjoyed a 'cocaine-fuelled' romp in a hotel spa on their first date.

Wants him back? He added that Katie has reportedly been in touch since their split and tried to get him back, with the builder claiming he's been 'treated like a mug' and that she's not a 'victim' (pictured recently on her YouTube channel)

The builder, 22, branded Katie, 41, who is in recovery, a zero-to-one out of ten in the bedroom and called her a 'lazy lover' after they had spent the evening bingeing on drinks and drugs.

He told The Sun that drugs were already there when he arrived and said when he woke up in the morning, Katie still hadn't gone to bed.

He said: 'We had a few drinks to relax and then headed up to the hotel room where we had even more and that's when things started to get intimate for the first time.'

Charles said he found the night 'disappointing' and an 'anti-climax'.

Cruel: Charles' claims comes after he showed his true colours with a separate kiss and tell with the publication in which he claimed they enjoyed a 'cocaine-fuelled' romp in a hotel spa on their first date

He said: 'I can't say zero, can I? I'd give her a one out of ten. She was a bit lazy, but then suddenly she would surprise you and jump on top.'

Charles claims Katie stayed up all night, while he slept and trashed the hotel room and said he had to 'pick up snotty tissues in the morning.'

He said: 'She was still wide awake the morning after. The hotel was a mess, so whatever she was up to in the night, I was sleeping through.'

He did defend her by saying is a good mother but is using drugs to cope, but claims she is 'all over the place'.

A spokesperson for Katie Price told MailOnline: 'There is no truth in the allegation that she is taking drugs every day and has made significant steps to being drug free.

'There have been lapses in the past but they are just that, not a regular event. Katie is still in recovery and making progress.'
